exception.name: ErrorSignatureCounterExhausted
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the physical memory of the signature counter can no longer guarantee error-free operation of the signature counter.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorSignatureCounterExhausted that is thrown if the physical memory of the signature counter can no longer guarantee error-free operation of the signature counter.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when signature counter physical memory is exhausted
specification.applicability: All logging operations when signature counter exhausted
